"},{"text":"Vecto Shamir","underlined":true},{"text":"
"},{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"Vecto creates temporary boats and minecarts for easy travel."},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.vecto_shamir.1"}]}]

sections.name: page_1
pages: ["",{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"The Vecto Shamir is found on Bismuth Bands. It can be placed onto boots.\n\nSneak on top of water, ice, or rails to summon a temporary boat or minecart. This vehicle disappears once the player who summoned it is not near it anymore."},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.vecto_shamir.2"}]}]
